protection-policy
*****************


Description
===========

The details of a protection policy.A policy defines the exact number
of days to retain protected database backups created by Recovery
Service. Each protected database must be associated with one
protection policy. You can use Oracle-defined protection policies or
create custom policies to suit your internal backup storage regulation
demands.


Available Commands
==================

* change-compartment

* create

* delete

* get

* update
